title: Building a Kubernetes Pod Doctor with Gradio and GPT-4
author: Team CodeReliant
description: Pod Doctor allows you to interact with your Kubernetes pods, retrieve information and troubleshoot pods, and receive expert insights from GPT-4
cntitle: 使用 Gradio 和 GPT-4 构建 Kubernetes Pod 医生
cndescription: Pod Doctor 允许您与 Kubernetes Pod 交互，检索信息并对 Pod 进行故障排除，并从 GPT-4 接收专家见解
